name: pyBioLab
body:
by [Charles Fracchia](charlesfracchia@gmail.com) Â© 2012

# Description
This package allows you to control and collect data from biological equipment found in laboratories. You can control any equipment that has a serial connection capabilities (see equipment section below). The equipment can be controlled wirelessly using [XBees](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XBee).

# Demo
Please see the [demo video]()

# Installation
### Hardware
### Software

# Dependencies
* [python-xbee](http://code.google.com/p/python-xbee)
* pySerial

# Thanks
* Steve Heisig
* Daniel Levner
* Adam Marblestone
tagline: Bring biological research into the 21st Century
